headline: UK ‘difficult’ operating environment says Merck boss after £1bn London site axed
summary: Last week, Merck’s business in the UK and Europe, MSD, said it will move its life sciences operation to the US, impacting around 125 British jobs.

raw.headline: UK ‘difficult’ operating environment says Merck boss after £1bn London site axed
raw.summary: Last week, Merck’s business in the UK and Europe, MSD, said it will move its life sciences operation to the US, impacting around 125 British jobs.

headline: MRK, Daiichi's ADC Drug Gets FDA Breakthrough Tag for Ovarian Cancer
summary: Merck and Daiichi's raludotatug deruxtecan wins FDA Breakthrough tag for treating CDH6 expressing platinum-resistant ovarian, primary peritoneal or fallopian tube cancers.

headline: Is Merck (MRK) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Merck (MRK) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

raw.headline: Is Merck (MRK) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
